chunk:
Bioelements Sensitive Skin Cleansing Oil

Brand: BioElements

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, PEG-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis

Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract

Directions: AM: With dry hands and a dry face, apply 3-4 pumps into palm, and massage onto skin. Add water to fingertips and continue to massage until a light milky froth appears. Rinse. Follow by misting face, neck and v-area with Soothing Reset Mist, and apply Sensitive Eye Smoother and Barrier Fix Daily Hydrator.PM: With dry hands and a dry
